channel.title: Option for polyphonic sub patch mode missing in current version?
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a polyphonic synth but the settings menu that I used to use has disappeared
I used to change the subpatch mode by ticking this checkbox in the settings menu like so --> https://youtu.be/d7Xv99v1RwI?t=337
But now, when i click settings, it brings up some weird box that looks totally different and doesnt have any of the options that used to be in the settings menu.
Anyone know what I'm supposed to do/have a link to a new tutorial video?

item.title: Option for polyphonic sub patch mode missing in current version?
item.dc:creator: @Androoclops
item.description:
@Androoclops wrote:

Nevermind! I loaded up the voice patch today and the settings menu was there like it normally was...I genuinely have no idea what I had done. Meh.!

Read full topic
item.source: Option for polyphonic sub patch mode missing in current version?
